Hi Nicholas,

Awesome, thanks for sharing. We have adjusted a smooth scroll in the settings.

Can you try now?

Hi Joel,

Just approved. Let me know if there's any issues.

Kind Regards,
Nick

Hi Nicholas,

Thanks for the screenrecord. I dont seem to have access to the google link.
I have ask for permission to view the link joel@wolfiq.com.au.

Hi Joel,

It appears to be every page from what myself and the DuraCube team can see.

I've screen recorded an example for you below.
Home - Toilet and Shower Partitions, Compact Laminate Tabletops in Sydney, Brisbane, Queensland, ...
Kind Regards,

Nicholas Serafin

13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750

Hi Nicholas,

I hope all is well.

We are looking into this, the scroll functionality is working correctly. Can you send a specific page where you are having trouble scrolling?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

Hoping Wolf IQ may be able to assist with the issue described in this email thread.

You may notice on our website that the scrolling function is no longer working correctly.

I am thinking this may have something to do with the plugins on our site, but am not certain of this.

Could Wolf IQ please assist in addressing this?

Please let me know if there's any questions.

Thank you!
Kind Regards,
Nicholas Serafin
Marketing Manager
13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
0490 124 121
DuraCube
DuraCube


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Bridie Conroy <b.conroy@digilari.com.au>
Date: Mon, Feb 17, 2025 at 2:16 PM
Subject: Re: Website Updates
To: Nicholas Serafin <nicholas.serafin@duracube.com.au>
Cc: Nidhi Toppo <nidhi.toppo@duracube.com.au>


Hi Nick,

I'm sorry for the delay, it was on my list to email you with an update today. Unfortunately, we had one developer sick last week and some urgent tasks for our other developer.
However, Duracube is back on the agenda to complete this week and next.

That could definitely be the problem. Perhaps getting WolfIQ involved for the technical scroll issue would be good while our developers focus on the updates.
Does that work for you?

Thank you
Bridie



On Mon, 17 Feb 2025 at 12:30, Nicholas Serafin <nicholas.serafin@duracube.com.au> wrote:
Hi Bridie,

Hope you had a great weekend.

Just checking in on where your developers are at regarding continuing the DuraCube website?

Obviously quite a bit got done before 10th Feb, but I feel like that's when progress stopped.

For example:
  • The scrolling function of the website is still not working. Having Googled this, I found the below. Could this be the solution? Do we need to get Wolf IQ involved?

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26789137/scrolling-has-suddenly-stopped-working-in-wordpress-site
  • The inspiration menu is still way off, with biophilic naturals not sitting under Styles, and Case studies missing completely?

  • New products still missing from menu
Kind Regards,
Nicholas Serafin
